wikipedia_page.main: Leonard Jones (9 June 1913 – March 1998) was an English footballer who played in the Football League as a wing half for Barnsley, Plymouth Argyle, Southend United and Colchester United. He also was signed to but failed to make a first-team appearance for Huddersfield Town and Ipswich Town.

response: Bicknell left Clacton Town in 1963 to become a bookmaker. After managing at Brantham, he ran Hythe Coffee Shop in Hythe, near Colchester, alongside former U's teammate Len Jones. He later worked at the County Court, before retiring in 1987.
Len Jones may also refer to:
